value.desc: Time of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

format24h.desc: Forces 24 hour time display instead of AM/PM system
format24h.default: (based on Quasar lang language being used)

options.desc: Optionally configure what time is the user allowed to set; Overriden by 'hour-options', 'minute-options' and 'second-options' if those are set

hour-options.desc: Optionally configure what hours is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set

minute-options.desc: Optionally configure what minutes is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set

second-options.desc: Optionally configure what seconds is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set

with-seconds.desc: Allow the time to be set with seconds

now-btn.desc: Display a button that selects the current time
